title: GT4 WS AA Authorization Framework Release Notes

section.title: Authorization when no authentication is required
section.para: We no longer invoke any authorization modules when a method is invoked and the service or resource does not impose any authentication requirements on said method.

section.title: Internationalization
section.para: The authorization framework code has been internationalized.

section.title: For More Information
section.para: Click here for more information about this component.
